climbs.name: Lotus
climbs.fa: Trevor Bowman, Pete Thompson, Neil Kauffman  1026/06

content.description:
On the east face of the upper block. Start up a left-facing layback flake to 1/2 height, then follow nice edges up the face.

Established ground-up, with the bolt placed from a free stance.
content.location: On the east face of the upper block.

climbs.name: Hangover Helper
climbs.fa: Pete Thompson, Trevor Bowman, Neil Kauffman  10/26/06

content.description: On the southeast face of the upper block. Start out of a chimney slot, follow a fingercrack to a crux transition into the upper, low-angled dihedral that is just left of a small pine tree on the summit.
content.location: On the southeast aspect of the upper block.

climbs.name: Feather in Your Cap
climbs.fa: Trevor Bowman, Pete Thompson, Neil Kauffman  1026/06

content.description: On the south face (above the tracks). Follow a splitter fingercrack to 1/2 height, cut left a few feet, and follow a featured face face past a bolt to the top.
content.protection: Gear to #2 BD, 1 bolt, gear anchors.
content.location: On the south face (above the tracks) of the rock.

climbs.name: Cap it Off
climbs.fa: Trevor Bowman, Pete Thompson, Neil Kauffman  1026/06

content.description: The prominent right-leaning, left-facing dihedral on the west face of the upper block. It is primarily a fingercrack/stem affair.
content.location: On the west face of the upper block, some scrambling accesses the base.
